title: The Telltale Wrapper
description:
Allan has the perfect plan to sneak the cookies from the special snack cabinet, but will he get away with it? Tune in to this (not scary) adaptation of an Edgar Allan Poe story to find out!


If you would like to support Stories Podcast, you can subscribe and give us a five star review on iTunes, head to patreon.com/stories and pledge to make a monthly donation, or just tell your friends about us! You can also support this episode's sponsor: Rockets of Awesome! Head to RocketsofAwesome.com/STORIES and use promo code STORIES to get 20% off your first order of these super cool and unique kids clothes!


You can hear ad-free new episodes of Stories Podcast plus our full archive, also completely ad-free, only on Stitcher Premium. For a free month of Stitcher Premium, go to stitcherpremium.com/wondery and use promo code 'WONDERY'!


Thank you!!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
